subject: Re: Finally got something on EVPMkr!
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I like AM on other radios, but on the 12-820 the FM works the best.  
I really get some good answers from it, the sweep rate is a little 
quick but they can work it nicely.  So, i would suggest using the FM 
on that one, but that's just my preference.  Anyway, i appreciate 
your dedication to this research and everyday i feel i have to play 
catch up with the awesome communication you get.  Nah, just kidding.  
We all work together like family, aint that right sis?

Always a great job K,
-Steve H. (A Fan)



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...> 
wrote:
>
> Thanks for your input Steve! It's hard to get an ear for the 
allophones
> because I am so used to zoning in that it now goes against my grain 
to zone
> out.  But practice makes better!
> 
> And yes it beats the falling out.. I mean hanging out my window any 
day!  I
> returned the badly hacked Hultay Hack and went directly to another 
RS and
> bought one (don't tell anyone).  This time I hacked correctly - But 
I swear
> I almost screwed it up again..  Those dang wires..
> 
> But it works and I taped a session and a I'm going over it now.  
Reception
> is much better on this but I find the Am sweeps much slower than 
the 470 or
> 469.  Therefore I am hearing stations far longer than I want to.
> 
> k
> 
>  
> 
>   _____  
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On 
Behalf Of
> Steve Hultay
> Sent: Wednesday, April 02, 2008 6:40 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Finally got something on EVPMkr!
> 
>  
> 
> The first one i hear "Arthur---employee airhole". Maybe they are 
> describing a situation while alive and we just aren't understanding 
> correctly. The second i hear "You forget the evil eye". The last 
one 
> i hear as you do. Hey, this format beats hanging out the window to 
get 
> a signal from the shack hack and it's clearer too. I think when we 
get 
> familiar with the speech from this, it's going to be fantastic. 
Others 
> should try this method as well, who live in a bad radio signal 
location.
> 
> -Steve H.
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups <mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com> .com,
> "Kristin" <ckmorris95@> wrote:
> >
> > I just posted three MP3 files in my folder (Kristin's Folder)from 
a
> > session I did today using EVP Maker and the Allophones. Please 
listen
> > to see if you hear as I do. I find this way much tougher to hear
> > live... so I hope I am doign better! Please let me know. THX!
> > 
> > k
> > 
> > The first one actually coincides with Margaret's.. ARTHUR EMPLOYS 
AIR
> > HOLES.
> > 
> > The second ones says: YOU ARE GETTING THE EVIL EYE
> > 
> > Third one says: YOU ARE VALUABLE
> > 
> > Kristin
> >
>
